abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Los Angeles Kings, 2-1; other NHL results noted.
snippet: The veteran goalie Martin Brodeur sustained a minor shoulder injury in the Devils’ 2-1 victory over the Kings.
lead_paragraph: The veteran goalie Martin Brodeur sustained a minor shoulder injury in the Devils’ 2-1 victory over the Kings.

headline.main: Devils Win Shootout After Brodeur Leaves With Injury
headline.print_headline: Devils Win Shootout After Brodeur Leaves With Injury
headline.seo: Shootout Goals Lift Devils After Brodeur Leaves Injured
